title: Call of Duty Black Ops [LAN] [no-Steam]
description:
================================================================================
Call of Duty: Black Ops L.A.N. working! Just install & play.
================================================================================

English only


================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
================================================================================

- Custom installer compressed (1xDVD9), which can shutdown the computer for you at the end of the installation.
- The game is updated to the last version until today and it includes all the DLCs, but several videos have been deleted to be able to make a DVD9.
- The campaign works, and also the multiplayer and the zombies mode in L.A.N. without having to use Steam
- A guide about how to play online and the libraries the game requires are also included.


================================================================================
Instructions:
================================================================================

1. Mount or unrar the .iso and run the .exe file to install the game.
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.


================================================================================
FAQ:
================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, in local area network, either physical or using Evolve, Tunngle, Hamachi or similar.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No.

Q: What DLCs are included?
A: All of them.

Q: Does it work under Windows 10?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
